items.name: Tickle Gomen
items.description: Delicious curried vegetable stew with cabbage, potatoes, green peppers, onion and olive oil.

items.name: Misir Wat
items.description: Split red lentils, onion, olive oil, berbera, garlic, blend of hot Ethiopian herbs, dumplings.

items.name: Veggie Combo
items.description: A sample dish of veggies.

items.name: Aterkik Alicha
items.description: Split yellow peas in red onion, olive oil, garlic and various homemade spices

items.name: Shiro
items.description: Split yellow peas in red onion, olive oil, garlic and various homemade spices.

items.name: Fish Gullahs
items.description: Pieces of fish fillet mixed with onions, garlic oil, green pepper, served with injera

items.name: Fosolia (String Beans & Carrots)
items.description: Lightly spiced string beans cooked with carrots & onions

items.name: Azifah (Brown Lentils)
items.description: Whole brown lentils blended with onion, green pepper and spices / Served Cold

items.name: Spaghetti
items.description: Pasta mixed with carrot, white peas, green pepper, onions and olive oil

items.name: Abyssinian Vegetarian
items.description: Ask for server

items.name: Azeb Gouda Mixed Platter
items.description: Key wat(spicy Beef), Yebeg Alicha Wat(lamb non spicy),Doro wat(Chicken with Hard boiled egg and ethiopian home made cheese) Tibs(pan grilled beef)

items.name: Godin Tibs
items.description: Beef / lamb ribs served with awaze and purified Ethiopian butter

items.name: Doro Wat
items.description: Ethiopian national dish. Tender chicken parts, onions, olive oil, berbera based stew with one hard boiled eggs

items.name: Abyssinia Signature
items.description: Sampler of doro wat, lamb tabs, lamb wat, spicy beef homemade cheese and all vegetarian dishes in the house

items.name: Bozeena Shiro
items.description: Chunks of beef marinated in ground Ethiopian butter served in shiro wat

items.name: Abyssinya Zil Zil Tibs
items.description: Cubed beef marinated in wine, sauteed in purified Ethiopian butter

items.name: Special Kitfo
items.description: The delicacy of Ethiopian dish, minced beef tossed in kibe (spices of clarified homemade) Ethiopian butter, mitmita or Ethiopian chili powder and ayebe or Ethiopian cheese, fresh gomen or collar greens

items.name: Regular Kitfo
items.description: Minced beef, Ethiopian butter and Ethiopian mitmita or chili powder and salt

items.name: Agelgel
items.description: A veggie sampler dish and meat with tibs

items.name: Yawaze Yebere Tibs (Spicy Pan Grilled Beef Cubes)
items.description: Lean beef cubes pan grilled with jalapenos, onions, fresh rosemary and awaze. Garnished with salad and served with injera

items.name: Key Wat (Spicy Beef Stew)
items.description: Tender beef cubs simmered in berbere (red pepper) and onion, garlic flavored with various spices

items.name: Gomen Besiga
items.description: Beef cubes sauteed in collard green with Ethiopian herbs and spices

items.name: Derek Tibs
items.description: Strip of tender beef marinated in onion and homemade spices and fresh rosemary

items.name: Rice
items.description: Red or yellow rice prepared with chicken or beef sauteed with garlic oil and black pepper served with fresh salad

items.name: Firm Tibs
items.description: Prime beef or Lamb with grilled onions, jalapeno and Ethiopian butter

items.name: Kikil
items.description: Kiki tender strips of lamb in homemade Ethiopian butter.

items.name: Yebeg Alicha Wat
items.description: Tender strips of lamb simmered in homemade herbal butter seasoned with onions, olive oil, garlic and Ethiopian spices.

items.name: Tibbs Furfur
items.description: Tender beef tips pan grilled onions.

items.name: Scrambled Egg (Breakfast)
items.description: Scrambled egg with tomato, jalapeno with French toast.

items.name: Fuol (Breakfast)
items.description: Crushed black beans, garnished with fresh onion, jalapeno pepper, sour cream fresh bread.

items.name: Quanta Firfir (Breakfast)
items.description: Smoked and dried beef seasoned with Ethiopian spice mixed with pieces of injera.

items.name: Chechebsa (Breakfast)
items.description: Scrambled homemade bread mixed with butter and pepper.

items.name: Tibbs Furfur (Breakfast)
items.description: Tender beef tips pan grilled with onions.

items.name: Genfo (Breakfast)
items.description: Barely or wheat flour, salt, butter or olive oil and berbera.

items.description: Red lentils with home made cheese rolled on injera

items.name: Sambussa
items.description: Green lentils, green peppers, onions and salt wrapped with tortilla

items.description: Green lentils, carrots, onions and Ethiopian spices

items.description: Lettuce, red onion, black pepper, tomatoes vinegar, olive oil & house dressing
